豵豵豵

豵字的基本解释

豵
zōng
小猪；亦泛指小兽：“壹发五豵。”
一胎生三子的猪。

豵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
［《廣韻》即容切，平鍾，精。］
六个月到一岁的小猪。一说，豕生三子谓之“豵”。

豵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豕字部】　豵； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1199第02
【唐韻】子紅切。【集韻】【韻會】祖叢切，?音葼。【說文】生六月豚。一曰一歲豵，尚叢聚也。【爾雅·釋獸】豕生三，豵。【註】豬生子常多，故別其少者之名。【小爾雅】豕之小者謂之豵。【詩·召南】壹發五豵。【晉書·張協·七命】班題之豵。　又【廣韻】卽容切【集韻】將容切，?音蹤。又【集韻】牆容切，音從。義?同。　【集韻】或作?。

豵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
豵字的起名意思

暂无。

pigling
Basic explanation of words
pigling
zōng
Little pig; also refers to little beasts generally: "One hair and five pigeons."
A pig that has three sons in one birth.
pigling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
["Guangyun" is Rongqi, Pingzhong, Jing. ]
Piglets from six months to one year old. In other words, the three sons of pigs are called "Zi".
pigling
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Department of hog characters] 　豵; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1199 02
[Tang Yun] Red cut. [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Ancestor Cong cut,? Yin Feng. [Said the text] Birth June dolphin. One said one-year-old Bao, who still gathers together. 【Erya·Shi Beast】Three pigs are born, pigs are born. [Note] Pigs often give birth to many children, so don't name them the few. 【Xiao Erya】The small hog is called the hog. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】One send five poems. 【Book of Jin·Zhang Xie·Seven Lives】Class Titles.　[Guangyun] 卽 Rongqie [Jiyun] Will Rongqie,? Sound track. Also 【Jiyun】The wall is cut, and the sound follows. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】or make?.

Name meaning

zōng
сущ. поросёнок; молодая (дикая) свинья; кабанёнок
壹发五豵 одним выстрелом пять поросят!
